name: San Francisco Tenants Union
description: Tenant counseling, education, and advocacy for San Francisco renters
fullDescription: The San Francisco Tenants Union provides tenant counseling, education, and advocacy to help renters understand and exercise their rights under SF rent control laws.
whatTheyOffer:
- Tenant counseling and advice (free for members)
- Help understanding rent control laws
- Assistance with habitability complaints
- Guidance on eviction defense
- Tenant rights workshops
- Advocacy for tenant-friendly policies
howToGetIt:
1. Become a member ($50/year sliding scale)
2. Attend drop-in counseling hours
3. Call the counseling line for advice
4. Attend free tenant rights workshops
5. Get referrals to legal services if needed
keywords: tenants union, San Francisco, tenant rights, rent control, eviction, landlord, housing, counseling, renter, lease
